questions.question: Rain \ is \ falling \ vertically \ with \ 3 \ m/s \ and \ a \ man \ is \ moving \ due \ North \ with \ 4 \ m/s. \ In \ which \ direction \ should \ he \ hold \ the \ umbrella \ to \ protect \ himself \ from \ rains?
